mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.name, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.sort, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date, a.del_flag
LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_menu a WHERE a.del_flag = 0
and a.name like '%#{name}%'
ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_menu a JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = 1 WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0 AND a.is_show = '1' AND a.parent_id = '0' ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_menu a JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0 AND a.is_show = 1 ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_menu a JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0
AND a.parent_id = #{parentId}
ORDER BY a.sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu( id, parent_id, name, href, target, icon, sort, is_show, permission, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name}, #{href}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{isShow}, #{permission}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, target = #{target}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
